headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HAFFNER, ALDEN N

snippet: HAFFNER--Alden N. Orchestra of St. Luke's mourns the loss of Board member Dr. Alden N. Haffner. His passion for music and generosity of spirit will be sorely missed. We extend our deepest sympathy to friends and family. Board, Musicians, and Staff of Orchestra of St. Luke's 1/3
lead_paragraph: HAFFNER--Alden N. Orchestra of St. Luke's mourns the loss of Board member Dr. Alden N. Haffner. His passion for music and generosity of spirit will be sorely missed. We extend our deepest sympathy to friends and family. Board, Musicians, and Staff of Orchestra of St. Luke's 1/3
